books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: The struggling detective Cormoran Strike investigates a supermodel’s suicide; by J.K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE CUCKOO'S CALLING

books.author: by Jessica Sorensen
books.description: For Callie to save Kayden, she must face her greatest fear and expose her own painful secrets.
books.name: THE REDEMPTION OF CALLIE AND KAYDEN

books.author: by J. Kenner
books.description: Not even Damien Stark can run from his ghosts or shield himself and Nikki Fairchild from danger. Book 3 of the Stark erotic trilogy.
books.name: COMPLETE ME

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: Feeling cursed in the romance department, Isabel goes home to Fool’s Gold, Calif., to run the family bridal shop.
books.name: THREE LITTLE WORDS

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, an art restorer and occasional spy for the Israeli secret service, steps in to help the British prime minister, whose lover has been kidnapped.
books.name: THE ENGLISH GIRL

books.author: by Ryan Winfield
books.description: A grieving mother takes in a young street musician to learn about her daughter’s death and finds herself falling for him.
books.name: JANE'S MELODY

books.author: by Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A multigenerational family saga centers on a brother and sister born in Afghanistan.
books.name: AND THE MOUNTAINS ECHOED

books.author: by Ilona Andrews
books.description: The mercenary Kate Daniels and her lover, the Beast Lord Curran, search for the panacea that will help ensure the survival of the Pack’s shapeshifting children.
books.name: MAGIC RISES

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: The F.B.I. agent John O’Hara investigates the murder of a pair of newlyweds.
books.name: SECOND HONEYMOON

books.author: by Gena Showalter
books.description: The half-Fae Josephina Aisling is being hunted by a brutal enemy and Kane is her only source of protection.
books.name: THE DARKEST CRAVING

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: The counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath uncovers a plot with roots in the 18th century.
books.name: HIDDEN ORDER

books.author: by C.  J. Box
books.description: The former investigator Cody Hoyt searches for two teenage girls who disappeared on a cross-country trip.
books.name: THE HIGHWAY

books.author: by A. S. A. Harrison
books.description: Told in alternating voices, this is a chilling portrait of a marriage gone terribly awry.
books.name: THE SILENT WIFE
